ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard? [How many days have you p layed!?]
ygData.msgSnippet: I LOVE YOU SHADA :P Seriously, well it prolly won t make YOU feel better but I just checked Hally and she is at 128 days... a friend calculated this in
ygData.messageBody:
I LOVE YOU SHADA :P

Seriously, well it prolly won't make YOU feel better but I just checked
Hally and she is at 128 days... a "friend" calculated this in months and
well, lets just say I considered quitting EQ and being more productive. But
then I realized that would probably entail a week of cleaning and exercise
only to end up with me in front of the couch or spending money going out
again...

So in addition to days played, I think we should also include how much money
EQ has saved us over the last two years :)

Halana, 58th Shaman
Tani, 39th Bard
Solusek Ro

> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)

>

> Afterlife
